boat.construction_details: Simulated clinker GRP with mahogany thwarts and gunwhales
boat.full_description:
'Tournesol' is a Tideway 12ft GRP reproduction of a Lew Walker designed Walker 12ft dinghy first designed and built by Lew Walker in the early 1950s at Leigh on Sea.

She is a gunter rigged sloop capable of sail, oar and outboard. She has participated in numerous sail and oar events including Milford Haven Seafair, Semaine du Golfe, Route du Sable and various Tideway Owners Association meetings around the UK.

Visit the Tideway Dinghy Owners' Association and Tideway Dinghies for more information about these boats.
boat.name: Tournesol
boat.short_description: 'Tournesol' is a Tideway 12 dinghy built in 2005
